snippet: Frito-Lay said it would begin to emphasize the extremes of the snack-food market, pursuing both the customers who crave premium products and those who shop for cheaper items.
abstract: Frito-Lay is building a 'company within a company' to pursue both the high-end snack category as well as offering products for consumers looking for cheaper items; new strategy comes as changing tastes are resulting in a move away from traditional snacks.
lead_paragraph: Frito-Lay said it would begin to emphasize the extremes of the snack-food market, pursuing both the customers who crave premium products and those who shop for cheaper items.

headline.seo: Frito-Lay Strategy Aims for Top and Bottom of Market
headline.main: Frito-Lay Takes New Tack on Snacks
